select ri.id, ri.vehicle_no, ri.shop_code, ri.reason, ri.price, ri.charge_person, ri.repair_start, ri.repair_end, ri.repair_shop, ri.shop_address, ri.content, ri.create_date, vi.vehicle_number, vi.name, vi.principal, vi.phone, vi.images from repair_info ri left join vehicle_info vi on (vi.vehicle_no = ri.vehicle_no) where 1 = 1
AND vi.vehicle_number LIKE CONCAT('%',#{repairInfo.vehicleNumber},'%')
AND vi.name LIKE CONCAT('%',#{repairInfo.vehicleName},'%')
AND vi.principal LIKE CONCAT('%',#{repairInfo.principal},'%')
order by ri.create_date desc
